text: @EricTrump So you’re saying your father’s ego boosting everybody loves me rally’s are great? I know you have to be up your Daddy’s A$$ for your paycheck but really????? COVID-19 spreads in close unmasked group settings,@JoeBiden CARES enough about ALL American’s safety. Your Dad DOESN’T!
